---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an idea or improvement
title: "[Feature] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Summary

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem / Motivation

What problem does this solve? What use case does it enable?

> e.g. "I'm always frustrated when I can't do X because..."

## Proposed Solution

How would you like this to work? Describe the ideal behavior.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you tried any workarounds? Are there alternative approaches?

## Additional Context

- Screenshots, mockups, or diagrams (if helpful)
- Related issues or PRs
- Any similar implementations in other tools you've seen

---

> **Note**: For large features, please consider opening a discussion first to align on the approach before writing code.
